item.title: 贝莱德的比特币基金成为“ETF 历史上最伟大的发行”
item.description: 贝莱德公司 (BlackRock Inc.) 旗下的 iShares 部门在全球提供超过 1,400 只交易所交易基金，但没有一只基金的表现如此出色。

item.title: 随着购买量减少，MicroStrategy 购买了价值 2.09 亿美元的比特币
item.description: MicroStrategy Inc. 表示，它购买了价值 2.09 亿美元的比特币，这是这家互联网时代软件制造商连续第八周购买原始加密货币的杠杆代理。

item.title: BlackRock’s Bitcoin Fund Became ‘Greatest Launch in ETF History’
item.description: BlackRock Inc.’s iShares unit offers more than 1,400 exchange-traded funds around the world, yet none of them have performed quite like this.

item.title: BlackRock’s Bitcoin Fund Became ‘Greatest Launch in ETF History’
item.description: BlackRock Inc.’s iShares unit offers more than 1,400 exchange-traded funds around the world, yet none of them have performed quite like this.

item.title: MicroStrategy Buys $209 Million of Bitcoin as Purchases Lessen
item.description: MicroStrategy Inc. said it bought $209 million of Bitcoin, marking the eighth consecutive week of purchases for the dot-com-era software maker turned leveraged proxy for the original cryptocurrency.

item.title: MicroStrategy Buys $209 Million of Bitcoin as Purchases Lessen
